body_html:
One hazard of this patch is that it toggles a global setting w.r.t. how CUDA libraries are linked by the FindCUDA module, which means that it affected by the particular of version FindCUDA (and how it was included). So for example, this PR actually breaks the Caffe2+ATen build, because while ATen's top-level sets the default CUDA library linkage to PUBLIC, Caffe2 is still using old style.

CC @Yangqing
